availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Gallagher (Mason County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of John Gallagher and Mary Gallagher. Married to Sarah E. Blackburn in Mason County on October 26, 1859.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 303.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film #000281844.
Find A Grave, "W. H. Gallagher (1838-1905)," Memorial #62213923, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/62213923 (accessed February 22, 2019).
